episode: I was surprised when my husband gave me a surprise birthday party to celebrate my 50th birthday.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was surprised when my husband gave me a surprise birthday party to celebrate my 50th birthday.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Wow, that sounds amazing! It must have been a wonderful surprise to celebrate such a special milestone.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, I had no idea he had been planning this surprise for me and I was truly surprised!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's awesome! He must really know how to make you feel special.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, I feel blessed to have my husband and he is truly my soulmate.  I felt so surprised that he planned this special party for me.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's so sweet! You're lucky to have each other.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, we are very blessed to have one another.  I felt special during the party and enjoyed this surprise birthday party with family and friends.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's wonderful! Sounds like a perfect celebration.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was a fun party!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's awesome! I'm so glad you had a great time.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was so surprised that everyone did a great job keeping this surprise party a secret from me.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's impressive! They must be great at keeping secrets.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: So true!  I was impressed at the surprise party being planned secretly.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely, it sounds like they pulled off an amazing surprise!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I have video footage of how surprised I was and it is fun to watch now to remember this special party.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's awesome! It's great to have those memories to look back on.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I still talk about this special birthday party with my husband, family, and friends.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's fantastic! It must have been a truly unforgettable celebration.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was such a special surprise party to celebrate my birthday!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: So glad it was special for you!
